title: Ticket #7290: custom print formats that do aggregation not working with condor_q
description:
a custom print format like 
condor_q -print-format idle.cpf
where the print format file uses SELECT UNIQUE to ask the schedd to count jobs with unique values for the given attributes (see #7241) is not currently working with condor_q. The problem is that the set of 'significant' attributes is not being sent to the schedd as part of that query, so the schedd ends up using a blank set for the aggregation, which results in no output.

The code to put the significant attributes in the query is missing as far back as the end of the 8.6 branch.
